sentences.en: Attempt to be ambidextrous--even children who are left-handed in these cultures are taught to eat with their right hand--or at least explain yourself to your fellow diners before plunging in.
sentences.cn: 还是努力让自己的双手都灵巧吧——在这些文化里，即使是左撇子的孩子也被教会用右手吃饭——或者至少吃饭前向同伴解释一下。

sentences.en: I'm neither left - handed nor right - handed; I'm ambidextrous.
sentences.cn: 我不是只用左手或右手, 我是双手并用.

sentences.en: Jack is an ambidextrous hitter; he can bat right - handed or left - handed.
sentences.cn: 杰克是一位双手都很灵巧的打击手; 他可以用右手或左手打击.

sentences.en: Not so for 24 year-old Chen Siyuan, an ambidextrous translator from northern China.
sentences.cn: 不过这名24 岁，双手灵巧的翻译陈思远可是例外。

sentences.en: The study, led by Ruth Propper, a psychology professor at Merrimack College in Massachusetts, found that the halves of the brain in those who are lefties or ambidextrous are more interlinked.
sentences.cn: 麻省莫瑞麦克学院的心理学教授露丝•普若普尔是这一研究的领头人。 该研究发现左撇子或双手通用的人的大脑两个半球的联系更紧密。

words.tran_cn: 怀二心；两手俱技巧独特；双手皆灵巧的本领或状态；两面派手法

trans.tran_cn: 左右手都灵的，搞两面派的，非常灵巧的，非常熟练的
trans.tran_en: able to use either hand equally well
